briefTitle: An Investigational Drug Study in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (0431-024)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients who are at least 18 years of age and not older than 78 with type 2 diabetes mellitus

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in HbA1c at Week 52
outcomeMeasures.description: HbA1c is measured as percent. Thus, this change from baseline reflects the Week 52 HbA1c percent minus the Week 0 HbA1c percent.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in HbA1c at Week 104
outcomeMeasures.description: HbA1c is measured as percent. Thus, this change from baseline reflects the Week 104 HbA1c percent minus the Week 0 HbA1c percent.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Body Weight at Week 52
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline at Week 52 is defined as Week 52 minus Week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Body Weight at Week 104
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline at Week 104 is defined as Week 104 minus Week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Hypoglycemic Events at Week 52
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants who reported 1 or more episodes of the adverse experience (AEs) of hypoglycemia.

outcomeMeasures.title: Hypoglycemic Events at Week 104
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants who reported 1 or more episodes of the adverse experience of hypoglycemia.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Clinical Adverse Experiences (CAEs) at Week 104
outcomeMeasures.description: An adverse experience (AE) is defined as any unfavorable and unintended change in the structure, function, or chemistry of the body temporally associated with the use of the SPONSOR'S product, whether or not considered related to the use of the product.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Serious CAEs at Week 104
outcomeMeasures.description: Serious CAEs are any AEs occurring at any dose that; Results in death; or Is life threatening; or Results in a persistent or significant disability/incapacity; or Results in or prolongs an existing inpatient hospitalization; or Is a congenital anomaly/birth defect; or Is a cancer; or Is an overdose.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Drug-related CAEs at Week 104
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with drug-related (as assessed by an investigator who is a qualified physician according to his/her best clinical judgment) CAEs.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Laboratory Adverse Experiences (LAEs) at Week 104
outcomeMeasures.description: A laboratory adverse experience (LAE) is defined as any unfavorable and unintended change in the chemistry of the body temporally associated with the use of the SPONSOR'S product, whether or not considered related to the use of the product.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Serious LAEs at Week 104
outcomeMeasures.description: Serious LAEs are any LAEs occurring at any dose that: results in death; or is life threatening; or results in a persistent or significant disability/incapacity; or results in or prolongs an existing inpatient hospitalization; or is a congenital anomaly/birth defect; or is a cancer; or is an overdose.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Drug-related LAEs at Week 104
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with drug-related (as assessed by an investigator who is a qualified physician according to his/her best clinical judgment) LAEs.
